entry.summary:
Author: AthenaGC94

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,254Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 35

Summary: Jason was less certain about this part.While you weren’t his first partner, sex never enticed him the way it enticed others. Don’t get him wrong. He wasn’t completely opposed to the idea of physical intimacy, but it took time for him to warm up to the idea. The moment had to feel right. With the right person. Jason didn’t do casual... well, anything. It had to mean something. You understood that and never pushed him to do anything that made him uncomfortable.He was finally ready to take that next step with you.

entry.title: everything leads back to you
entry.summary:
Author: marmilyde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,139Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Before everything, all they had was each other. Sharing squished sandwiches, stolen snacks, patching each other up after a rough day. It was better than being alone. That is, until his inevitable “death”.Years later, with the job Bruce offered everything seemed okay enough. Until Gotham began to crumble under Scarecrow’s terror—with the help of another masked soldier.Revenge is all that’s in his soul—etched deeply like the scars that never faded. Love won’t be enough to save them this time. They hold onto each other for just a little longer, even if it all burns.
